titleStmt.title: SII 14.254: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 254. (A.R. No. 322 of 1908.) KURUVITTUṞAI, NILAKKOTTAI TALUK, MADURAI DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CHITRARATHA-VALLABHA-PERUMĀḶ TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record of Jaṭāvarmaṉ Śrīvallabha dated on the 200th day of the 22nd year of his reign purports to have been issued while the king was seated on the paḷḷikkaṭṭil called Pāṇḍiyarāyaṉ in the theatre (nāṭakaśālai) within the palace at Madurai. It registers the remission of taxes granted by him in 5 vēli of land for worship, etc., to god Tiruchchakkarattāḻvār at Śōḷāntaka-chaturvēdimaṅgalam in Pāgaṉūrkūṟṟam.
The royal order issued under the name of Kōṉēriṉmaikoṇḍāṉ is engraved in continuation of this document and both the records are signed by Parākramapāṇḍya-Uttaramantri.

svastiśrī . tirumaṭantaiyuñ jayamaṭantaiyum tiruppuyaṅkaḷil Iṉitiruppa Irunilamum perumaiyeyta Eṇṭicaiyum kuṭainiḻaṟṟa maṉn(ā)varellām vantiṟaiñca maravile varumaṇimuṭi cūṭi teṉkumari mutalāyt tiraikkaṭale Ellaiyākap pārmuḻutuṅ kayalāṇai parantu ceṅkoluṭan vaḷara maṉṉiya virasiṅhāsaṉattu Ulakamuḻutu
ṭaiyāruṭaṉ viṟṟiruntaruḷi māmutal matikkulam vaḷarak komutal koccaṭaiyapaṉ marāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvallavadevar māṭakkuḷakkiḻ maturaik koyilil Uḷḷālai nāṭakacālaiyil paḷḷikkaṭṭil pāṇṭiyarāyaṉil Eḻuntaruḷi Iruntu Irupattiraṇṭāvatu nāḷ Irunūṟṟiṉāl pākaṉūrk kūṟṟattu coḻāntaka caturvvedima
ṅkalattu tiruccakkarattāḷvār koilil civaiṣavar ceyyat tiruvāymoḻin taruḷiṉapaṭi . munpivvūril tevatāṉam Iṟaiyiliyāy vanta ṉilattil teṉkarai yil muṉpu tiṟanta ṉilam Aiveliyum paḻampaṭiyey Iṟaiyiliyākavum Ivvūril Ivvāḷvār muṉpu tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāy varu
kiṟa ṉilamum Ivvāḻvārkkut tiruppaṭimāṟṟukkum Ikkoyil tiruppaṇikkum Uṭalāka Irupattiraṇṭāvatu mutal Antarāyam Uḷpaṭa tevatāṉa Iṟaiiliyākap peṟa veṇummeṉṟu periyān maikkuc coṉṉamaiyil Ivvāḻvārkku muṉpu Ivvūril tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāy varukiṟa ṉilattil tiṟanta
ṉilam Aiveliyum Antarāyam I Āḻvārkkut tiruppaṭimāṟṟukkum tiruppaṇikkum Uṭalāka Irupattiraṇṭāvatu mutal Antarāya muḷppaṭat tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭu Uḷvariyuṅ kāliṅkarāyan Olaiyum tarac connom tāṅkaḷ Ippaṭi kal lilum cempilum veṭṭik koḷka Eṉṟu tiruvāy moḻintaruḷiṉār . I
vai Aṇṭanāṭṭu perumaṇalūr māṇi tirumalai Uṭaiyāṉāṉa parākkirama pāṇṭiya Uttara maṉtari Eḻuttu . Ivai miḻalaik kūṟṟattuk koḻuvaṉūruṭaiyāṉ Araiyaṉ Ampalakkūttaṉ Eḻuttu .

svastiśrī . koneriṉmai koṇṭāṉ tiruccakkaratirttat taāḻvār koyiliṟ śrīvayiṣaṇa
varkku muṉpu Ivvūril tevartāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāy varukiṟa nilattil parākkirama pāṇṭi yaṉ kaṭṭaḷaiyil tiṟanta nilam Aivveliyum Ittevarkku Iṟaiyiliyākappeṟaveṇu meṉṟum Ittevar Antarāyam tiruppaṭimāṟṟukkum tiruppaṇikkum Uṭalākat tavira veṇumeṉṟu periyā
ṉ namakkuc ceraṉṉamai(li)yil muṉpu Ivvūril Iṟaiyiliyāy varukiṟa nilattāl Antarāyamum Ivvāḻvārkkut tiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nittanimantaṅkaḻuk kum tiruppaṇikkum Uṭalāka Irupattiraṇṭāvatu mutal Antarāyam Uṭpaṭa Iṟaiyili yākat tantom tāṅkaḷi
tu kaikkoṇṭu tiruppaṭimāṟṟu tiruppaṇi cellap paṇṇuka. yāṇṭu Irupat tiraṇṭāvatu nāḷ(ṉ) Irunūṟṟañaciṉāl vaṉtañ ceytaruḷi tu Ivai parākkiramapāṇṭiya Uttara mantiri Eḻuttu .
